content: to knit the lace section row 155 row 164 repeat row 9 row 18 335 row 127 rs k4 sm p1 k2tog k13 k2tog tbl p1 repeat to m sm k1 sm p1 k2tog k13 row 165 row 174 repeat row 127 136 351 k2tog tbl repeat to last 1 st before m p1 sm k4 235 sts no increase row 175 row 192 repeat row 9 row 26 387 row 128 ws k4 sm k1 p1 k1 p1tbl x 6 row 193 row 202 repeat row 9 row 18 407 k1 p1 k1 repeat to m sm p1 sm k1 p1 k1 all content & images © 2020 inese sang all rights reserved you may not sell copy or distribute this pattern or finished product in any format pattern support isangknits@gmail com 4 row 203 row 212 repeat row 127 row 136 picot bind off 423 refer to the video link of technique for picot edge bind off on page 2 border lace pattern panel refer to chart 3 on page 7 you have 439 sts on your needles optional if you are a tight knitter use size or two 1 using cable cast-on co 1 st and place it back larger needles than those used to obtain gauge on lh needle to knit the lace section 2 bind off 3 sts row 213 rs k4 sm yo k4 p1 k3tog k11 3 place the st back on lh needle k3tog tbl p1 repeat to last 4 sts before m k4 4 repeat steps 1-3 for four more times m1r sm k1 sm m1l k4 p1 k3tog k11 k3tog 5 repeat step 1 tbl repeat to last 5 sts before m p1 k4 yo k4 6 bind off 7 sts and place the st back on lh 339 sts needle row 214 ws k4 sm p5 k1 p13 k1 repeat to last 5 sts before p5 sm p1 sm p5 k1 p13 7 repeat steps 1-3 for 6 times repeat to last 6 sts before m k1 p5 sm k4 8 repeat step 1 row 215 k4 sm yo k2tog yo k1 yo k2tog 9 repeat step 6 tbl p1 k3tog yo k1 x 7 yo k3tog tbl p1 repeat to last 5 sts before m k2tog yo k1 yo repeat steps 7-9 until last 7 sts including the st that k2tog tbl m1r sm k1 sm m1l k2tog yo k1 is placed back on lh needle after bind off before yo k2tog tbl p1 k3tog yo k1 x 7 yo k3tog next m tbl repeat to last 6 sts before m p1 k2tog yo k1 yo k2tog tbl yo sm k4 431 repeat steps 1-3 two times row 216 k4 sm k to m sm p1 sm k to m sm repeat step 1 k4 bind off 5 sts row 217 k4 sm yo k4 k2tog tbl p1 k3tog repeat steps 1-3 two times k11 k3tog tbl p1 repeat to last 6 sts before m repeat step 1
